mapper.select: select m.MAJOR_ID as majorId, m.MAJOR_NAME as majorName, m.MAJOR_SCHOOL_SYSTEM as majorSchoolSystem, ms.SUBJECT_ID as subjectId, s.SUBJECT_NAME as subjectName, c.CLAZZ_ID as clazzId, c.CLAZZ_NAME as clazzName from EAS_MAJOR m left join EAS_MAJOR_SUBJECT_REL ms on m.MAJOR_ID = ms.MAJOR_ID left join EAS_SUBJECT s on ms.SUBJECT_ID = s.SUBJECT_ID left join EAS_CLAZZ c on m.MAJOR_ID = c.MAJOR_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
